widget.convert: {"templates": {"default": (30, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 1), size = (60, 30), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (80, 1), size = (90, 30), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (180, 1), size = (150, 30), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (340, 1), size = (300, 30), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (650, 1), size = (200, 30), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showNever"), "notselected": (30, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 1), size = (60, 30), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (80, 1), size = (90, 30), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (180, 1), size = (150, 30), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (340, 1), size = (200, 30), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (650, 1), size = (200, 30), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 28), gFont("Regular", 28)], "itemHeight": 30 }

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint
orgwidth=self.instance.size().width() orgpos=self.instance.position() textsize=self["text" ].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize=(textsize[0 ] + 80,textsize[1 ] + 80) offset=20 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset=90 wsizex=textsize[0 ] + 120 wsizey=textsize[1 ] + offset if (800 > wsizex): wsizex=800 wsize=(wsizex,wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text" ].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize=(wsizex - 20,80) self["list" ].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1 ])) self["list" ].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth=wsize[0 ] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,orgpos.y()))

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5, 0), size = (440, 35), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5, 35), size = (440, 65), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 2), # index 2 is the description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (445, 2), size = (48, 48), png = 4), # index 4 is the status pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (5, 50), size = (510, 2), png = 5), # index 4 is the div pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 28),gFont("Regular", 25)], "itemHeight": 60 }
